Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2013 09:42PM nostrilb wrote: I saw your post, and was surprised. Happy to hear you had such a great outcome. Going into my mastectomy, I was just happy I didn't have to do that shot again. Yup, I would rather have major surgery than have that shot. lol
